attributes.action: PRISON (Custodial) SENTENCES - Life should mean life
attributes.additional_details: Life should mean life imprisonment for Murder. Too often someone is given a "life" sentence with a "minimum" tariff to be served when they have committed the most heinous crime - that of murder for no justification or "reason", e.g. self defence of self, family or property.  Life imprisonment should mean a whole life tariff  for all but in the most restricted circumstances as outlined above.
